S04n421:1: iti hi bhikṣavo daśamāseṣu nigateṣu bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye pratyupasthite rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhodyāne dvātriṃśatpūrvanimittāni prādurabhūvan |
S04n421:4: puṣkariṇīṣu cotpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇyabhyudgatāni kuḍmalībhūtāni na puṣpanti sma |
S04n421:5: tadā ca puṣpaphalavṛkṣā dharaṇītalādabhyudgamya kṣārakajātā na phalanti sma |
S04n421:7: viṃśati ca ratnanidhānaśatasahasrāṇyutplatya vyavasthitāni dṛśyante sma |
S04n421:10: himavatparvatapārśvācca siṃhapotakā āgatyāgatyābhinadantaḥ kapilāhvayapuravaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya dvāramūleṣvavatiṣṭhante sma,
S04n421:12: pañcaśatāni pāṇḍarāṇāṃ hastiśāvakānāmāgatya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāgrakaraiścaraṇāvabhilikhanti sma |
S04n421:13: mekhalībaddhakāśca devadārakā rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāntaḥpure utsaṅgenotsaṅgamanuparivartamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n421:14: gaganatalagatārdhakāyā nāgakanyā nānāpūjopakaraṇaparigṛhītā adhyālambamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n421:15: daśa ca nāgakanyāsahasrāṇi mayūrāṅgahastakaparigṛhītā gagatatale'vasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n421:16: daśa ca pūrṇakumbhasahasrāṇi kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvanti saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n421:17: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi gandhodakabhṛṅgāraparigṛhītā mūrdhni dhārayantyo'vasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n421:18: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi chatradhvajapatākāparigṛhītā avasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyate sma |
S04n421:19: bahūni cāpsaraḥśatasahasrāṇi śaṅkhabherīmṛdaṅgapaṇavaiḥ ghaṇṭāvasaktaiḥ pratīkṣamāṇānyavasthitāni saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n421:21: sarvanadī ca prasravaṇāni ca na vahanti sma |
S04n421:24: ratnajālaparisphuṭaṃ ca rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhaṃ saṃsthitamabhūt |
S04n421:26: kūṭāgāraprāsādatoraṇadvārakataleṣu ca maṇiratnānyabhipralambamānāni ca saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n421:31: utkūlanikūlāśca pṛthivīpradeśāḥ samāḥ samavasthitāḥ sarvavīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakarathyāntarāpaṇamukhāni ca pāṇitalamṛṣṭānīva puṣpābhikīrṇāni virocante sma |
S04n421:33: sarvaśālavanadevatāśca patreṣvardhakāyānabhinirmāya namyamānāḥ sthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma |

S04n421:36: deva śṛṇu hi mahyaṃ bhāṣato yaṃ mataṃ me
S04n421:38: yadi ca tava na roṣo naiva doṣo na mohaḥ
S04n421:47: sādhu dadahi ājñāṃ gacchamo mā vilambaḥ ||3 ||

S04n421:69: vāhana kṛta sajjā lumbinī maṇḍitā sā |
S04n421:71: jaya jaya hi narendrā āyu pālehi dīrghaṃ

S04n421:112: tasya bhavati evaṃ vyakta yaṃ devadevo |

S04n421:116: deva atha ca nāgāḥ śakra brahmā ca pālāḥ |

S04n421:119: atha khalu bhikṣavo māyādevī caturaśītyā hayarathasahasraiḥ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaiḥ parivṛtā caturaśītyā gajarathasahasraiḥ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaiḥ caturaśītyā ca pattisahasraiḥ śūrairvīrairvarāṅgarūpibhiḥ susaṃnaddhadṛḍhavarmakavacitairanuparigṛhītā ṣaṣṭyā ca śākyakanyāsahasraiḥ puraskṛtā catvāriṃśatā ca sahasrai rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya jñātikulaprasūtaiḥ śākyaiḥ vṛddhadaharamadhyamaiḥ saṃrakṣitā,
S04n421:120: ṣaṣṭyā ca sahasrai rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāntaḥpureṇa gītavādyasamyaktūryatāḍāvacarasaṃgītisaṃpravāditena parivṛtā,
S04n421:122: caturaśītyā ca nāgakanyāsahasraiḥ caturaśītyā ca gandharvakanyāsahasraiḥ caturaśītyā ca kinnarakanyāsahasraiḥ caturaśītyā cāsurakanyāsahasraiḥ nānāvyūhālaṃkārālaṃkṛtābhiḥ nānāgītavādyavarṇabhāṣiṇībhiranugamyamānā niryāti sma |
S04n421:124: sarvavṛkṣāśca tasmin vanavare akālapatrapuṣpaphalāni dadanti sma |
S04n421:125: devaiśca tathā tadvanaṃ samalaṃkṛtamabhūt tadyathāpi nāma miśrakāvanaṃ devānāṃ samalaṃkṛtam ||
S04n421:126: atha khalu māyādevī lumbinīvanamanupraviśya tasmādrathavarādavatīrya naramarukanyāparivṛtā vṛkṣeṇa vṛkṣaṃ paryaṭantī vanādvanaṃ caṃkramyamāṇā drumād drumaṃ nirīkṣamāṇā anupūrveṇa yenāsau plakṣo mahādrumaratnavarapravaraḥ suvibhaktaśākhaḥ samapatramañjarīdharo divyamānuṣyanānāpuṣpasaṃpuṣpito varapravarasurabhigandhinānāgandhinānāraṅgavastrābhipralambito vividhamaṇivicitraprabhojjvalitaḥ sarvaratnamūladaṇḍaśākhāpatrasamalaṃkṛtaḥ suvibhaktavistīrṇaśākhaḥ karatalanibhe bhūmibhāge suvibhaktavistīrṇanīlatṛṇamayūragrīvāsaṃnibhe kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśe dharaṇītale saṃsthitaḥ pūrvajinajanetryābhinivāsitaḥ devasaṃgītyanugītaḥ śubhavimalaviśuddhaḥ śuddhāvāsadevaśatasahasraiḥ praśāntacittairabhinatajaṭāmakuṭāvalambitāvanatamūrdhabhirabhinandyamānastaṃ plakṣavṛkṣamupajagāma ||
S04n421:127: atha sa plakṣavṛkṣo bodhisattvasya tejonubhāvenāvanamya praṇamati sma |
S04n421:128: atha māyādevī gaganatalagateva vidyut dṛṣṭiṃ dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya plakṣaśākhāṃ gṛhītvā salīlaṃ gaganatalaṃ prekṣamāṇā vijṛmbhamānā sthitābhūt |
S04n421:129: atha tasmin samaye ṣaṣṭyapsaraḥśatasahasrāṇi kāmāvacaradevebhya upasaṃkramya māyādevyā upasthāne paricaryāṃ kurvanti sma ||
S04n421:130: evaṃrūpeṇa khalu puna ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato'sthāt |
S04n421:131: sa paripūrṇānāṃ daśānāṃ māsānāmatyayena māturdakṣiṇapārśvānniṣkramati sma smṛtaḥ saṃprajānannanupalipto garbhamalairyathā nānyaḥ kaściducyate'nyeṣāṃ garbhamala iti ||
S04n421:132: tasmin khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samaye śakro devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāpatiḥ purataḥ sthitāvabhūtām,
S04n421:133: yau bodhisattvaṃ paramagauravajātau divyakāśikavastrāntaritaṃ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaiḥ smṛtau saṃprajñau pratigṛhṇāte sma ||
S04n421:135: taṃ brahmā sahāpatirbrahmakāyikāśca devaputrā abhyutkṣipya brahmalokaṃ caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ copanāmayāmāsuḥ |
S04n421:137: atha tahi bodhisattvaṃ devatāḥ prathamataraṃ pratigṛhṇanti sma ||
S04n421:139: samanantarāvatīrṇasya ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāpṛthivīṃ bhittvā mahāpadmaṃ prādurabhūt |
S04n421:140: nandopanandau ca nāgarājānau gaganatale'rdhakāyau sthitvā śītoṣṇe dve vāridhāre'bhinirbhiṃttvā bodhisattvaṃ snāpayataḥ sma |
S04n421:141: śakrabrahmalokapālāḥ pūrvaṃgamāścānye ca bahavo devaputrāḥ śatasahasrā ye bodhisattvaṃ jātamātraṃ nānāgandhodakamuktakusumaiḥ snāpayantyabhyavakiranti sma |
S04n421:142: antarikṣe ca dve cāmare ratnacchatraṃ ca prādurbhūtam |
S04n421:143: sa tasmin mahāpadme sthitvā caturdiśamavalokayati sma |
S04n421:146: tasmin khalu punaḥ samaye bodhisattvaḥ pūrvakuśalamūlavipākajenāpratihatena divyacakṣuprādurbhūtena divyena cakṣuṣā sarvāvantaṃ trisāhastraṃ mahāsāhastraṃ lokadhātuṃ sanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṃ sadevamānuṣaṃ paśyati sma |
S04n421:147: sarvasattvānāṃ ca cittacaritaṃ ca prajānāti sma |
S04n421:148: jñātvā ca vyavalokayati sma-asti tvasau kaścitsattvo yo mayā sadṛśaḥ śīlena vā samādhinā vā prajñayā vā kuśalamūlacaryayā vā |
S04n421:149: yadā ca bodhisattvaḥ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau na kaṃcitsattvamātmatulyaṃ paśyati sma,
S04n421:150: atha tasminsamaye bodhisattvaḥ siṃha iva vigatabhayabhairavo'saṃtrastaḥ astambhī sucintitaṃ smṛtvā cintayitvā sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāni jñātvā aparigṛhīto bodhisattvaḥ pūrvāṃ diśamabhimukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrāntaḥ-pūrvaṃgamo bhaviṣyāmi sarveṣāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ dharmāṇām |
S04n421:151: tasya prakramata uparyantarīkṣe'parigṛhītaṃ divyaśvetavipulachatraṃ cāmaraśubhe gacchantamanugacchanti sma-yatra yatra ca bodhisattvaḥ padamutkṣipati sma,
S04n421:153: dakṣiṇāṃ diśamabhimukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrāntaḥ-dakṣiṇīyo bhaviṣyāmi devamanuṣyāṇām |
S04n421:155: saptame sthitvā siṃha ivāhlādanātmikāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate sma-ahaṃ loke jyeṣṭho'haṃ loke śreṣṭhaḥ |
S04n421:158: uttarāṃ diśamabhimukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrāntaḥ-anuttaro bhaviṣyāmi sarvasattvānām |
S04n421:159: adhastāddiśamabhimukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrāntaḥ-nihaniṣyāmi māraṃ ca mārasenāṃ ca |
S04n421:160: sarvanairayikāṇāṃ ca nirayāgnipratighātāya saha dharmameghavṛṣṭiṃ varṣiṣyāmi,

S04n421:169: tadā asyemānyevaṃrūpāṇi ṛddhiprātihāryāṇi bhavanti-tasmin khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samaye saṃhṛṣitaromakūpajātāḥ sarvasattvā abhūvan |
S04n421:170: mahataśca pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvo'bhūt bhairavasya romaharṣaṇasya |
S04n421:172: sarvartukālikāśca vṛkṣāstasmin samaye trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau saṃkusumitāḥ phalitāśca |
S04n421:174: apagatameghācca gaganācchanaiḥ sūkṣmasūkṣmo devaḥ pravarṣati sma |

S04n421:190: āvīcimādiṃ kṛtvā sarvanairayikāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvakāraṇād duḥkhaṃ tasminsamaye prasrabdham |
S04n421:193: yadā ca bodhisattvo jātamātraḥ sapta padāni prakrānto'bhūt,
S04n421:194: asaṃkhyeyākalpakoṭinayutaśatasahasraiḥ sucaritacaraṇairmahāvīryamahāsthāmadharmatāpratilambhena tasmin samaye daśadiglokadhātusthitā buddhā bhagavantastaṃ pṛthvīpradeśaṃ vajramayadhitiṣṭhanti sma |
S04n421:196: tāvanmahābalavegasamanvāgato hi bhikṣavo jātamātro bodhisattvaḥ sapta padāni prakrānto'bhūt |
S04n421:197: sarvalokāntarikāśca tasmin samaye mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan |

S04n421:224: paśya ānanda kiyantaṃ te mohapuruṣā bahvapuṇyābhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskariṣyanti,
S04n421:225: ye buddhadharmān pratikṣepsyanti lābhasatkāraślokābhibhūtā uccāralagnā lābhasatkārābhibhūtā itarajātīyāḥ ||

S04n421:233: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandaḥ saṃharṣitaromakūpajāto namo buddhāya ityuktvā bhagavantametadavocatmūrchā me bhagavan kāyasyābhūdimaṃ teṣāmasatpuruṣāṇāṃ samudācāraṃ śrutvā ||

S04n421:242: aprameyo hyānanda tathāgato gambhīro vipulo duravagāhaḥ |

S04n421:302: sa tasmin pitari kālagate na hi vihanyeta pitṛmitrasuparigṛhītaḥ |
S04n421:303: evabheva ānanda ye kecinmama śraddhāsyanti tānahamupādadāmi |

S04n421:325: divi divi ca vighuṣṭa lokottaraṃ tvaṃ janeṣī sutam ||24 ||
S04n421:326: yatha ca prabha viśuddha vibhrājate svarṇavarṇa śubhā
S04n421:328: yatha ca śatasahasra śuddhā śubhā vītarāgāḥ surā
S04n421:329: namiṣu muditacittā adyo jane sarvaloke hitam ||25 ||
S04n421:330: śakramapi ca brahmapālāpi cānyā ca yā devatā
S04n421:335: śakramapi ca brahma tau pāṇibhiḥ saṃpratīcchā muniṃ
S04n421:336: kṣetra śatasahasra saṃkampitā ābha muktā śubhā |
S04n421:337: api ca triṣu apāyi sattvā sukhī nāsti duḥkhaṃ puna
S04n421:342: sapta pada kramitva brahmasvaro muñci ghoṣottamaṃ
S04n421:346: api ca uragarājā śītoṣṇa dve vāridhāre śubhe(vyamuñcatāntarīkṣe sthitāḥ)
S04n421:350: prabhā ca rucirā muktā apāyāśca viśodhitāḥ |
S04n421:353: krama sapta padāṃ vīraḥ kramate balavīryavān ||32 ||
S04n421:354: pādau nikṣipate yatra bhūmau padmavarāḥ śubhāḥ |
S04n421:370: śvetaṃ ca vipulaṃ chatraṃ cāmarāṃśca śubhāmbarān |
S04n421:374: vṛddhi vipula jātu devā suto bhūṣito lakṣaṇaiḥ |
S04n421:377: na ca bhavi pratiśatru jambudhvaje ekachatro bhavet ||39 ||
S04n421:380: vṛddhi vipula deva jātā nṛpe śākiyānāṃ kule |
S04n421:382: sarvi balaupeta nagnāḥ samā duṣpradharṣā paraiḥ ||40 ||
S04n421:383: aparu puruṣa āha devā śruṇā nandaśabdaṃ mamā
S04n421:385: api ca daśasahasra jātā hayāḥ kaṇṭhakasya sakhā
S04n421:388: nṛpati kramatalebhi cānvākramī sādhu devā jayā |
S04n421:389: ājñā khalu dadāhi gacchāma kiṃ vā karomo nṛpā
S04n421:390: tvamiha vaśitu prāptu bhṛtyā vayaṃ bhaṭṭa devā jayā ||42 ||
S04n421:394: iyamapi suti devadevottame vṛddhi rājño gṛhe ||43 ||
S04n421:395: api ca nṛpati gaccha prekṣa svayaṃ sarvameva prabho (puṇyateja prabho)
S04n421:396: naramarutasahasra ye harṣitā dṛṣṭva jāte guṇāṃ |
S04n421:397: bodhivara aśoka saṃprasthitāḥ kṣipra bhomā jināḥ ||44 || iti ||
S04n421:398: iti hi bhikṣavo jāte bodhisattve tatkṣaṇaṃ dānanisargaḥ punaruttari pravartate sma |
S04n421:403: pañca kareṇusahasrāṇi pañca piṅgasahasrāṇi prasūyante sma |
S04n421:404: tāni sarvāṇi rājñā śuddhodanena pustavaropitāni kumārasya krīḍārthaṃ dattānyabhūvan ||
S04n421:405: caturṇāṃ ca dvīpakoṭīśatasahasrāṇāṃ madhye pṛthivīpradeśe aśvatthayaṣṭiḥ prādurabhūdantardvīpe ca candanavanaṃ prādurbabhūva bodhisattvasya paribhogārthaṃ bodhisattvasyaivānubhāvena |
S04n421:407: pañca ca nidhānasahasrāṇi dharaṇītalādutplutya mukhaṃ darśayanti sma |
S04n421:408: iti hi ye kecidrājñaḥ śuddhodanasyārthābhipretā abhūvan,
S04n421:410: tato rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhūt-kimahaṃ kumārasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmīti |
S04n421:411: tato'syaitadabhūt- asya hi jātamātreṇa mama sarvārthāḥ saṃsiddhāḥ |
S04n421:413: tato rājā bodhisattvaṃ mahatā satkāreṇa satkṛtya sarvārthasiddho'yaṃ kumāro nāmnā bhavatu iti nāmāsyākārṣīt ||
S04n421:414: iti hi bhikṣavo jāte bodhisattve mātuḥ kukṣipārśvamakṣatamanupahatamabhavadyathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt |
S04n421:416: pañcāpsaraḥ-sahasrāṇi divyagandhaparivāsitatailaparigṛhītāni bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma |
S04n421:417: pañcāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyānulepanaparigṛhītāni bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma |
S04n421:418: pañcāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyagandhodakaparipūrṇaghaṭāparigṛhītāni bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma |
S04n421:419: paccāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyānulepanaparigṛhītani bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma |
S04n421:420: pañcāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyadārakācīvaraparigṛhītāni bodhisatvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujārajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma |
S04n421:421: pañcāpsaraḥ- sahasrāṇi divyadārakābharaṇaparigṛhītāni bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma |
S04n421:422: pañcāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyatūryasaṃgītisaṃprabhaṇitena bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma |
S04n421:423: yāvantaśceha jambudvīpe bāhyāḥ pañcabhijñā ṛṣayaste sarve gaganatalenāgatya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya purataḥ sthitvā jayavṛddhiśabdamanuśrāvayanti sma ||
S04n421:424: iti hi bhikṣavo jātamātro bodhisattvaḥ saptarātraḥ lumbinīvane divyamānuṣyakaistūryatālāvacaraiḥ satkriyate sma,
S04n421:432: dvātriṃśacca brāhmaṇaśatasahasrāṇi dine dine saṃtarpyante sma |
S04n421:434: śakraśca devānāmindro brahmā ca tasyāṃ brāhmaṇaparṣadi māṇavakarūpamabhinirmāyāgrāsane niṣadyemāṃ maṅgalyāṃ gāthāmabhyabhāṣatām-
S04n421:435: apāyāśca yathā śāntā sukhī sarvaṃ yathā jagat |
S04n421:436: dhruvaṃ sukhāvaho jātaḥ sukhe sthāpayitā jagat ||45 ||
S04n421:441: na bādhante yathā kleśā jātaṃ maitrajanaṃ jagat |
S04n421:443: yathā saṃpuṣpitāḥ śālā medinī ca samā sthitā |
S04n421:451: yathā ca manujā devān devāḥ paśyanti mānuṣān |
S04n421:453: yathā ca jvalanaḥ śāntaḥ sarvā nadyaśca visthitāḥ |
S04n421:454: sūkṣmaṃ ca kampate bhūmiḥ bhavitā tattvadarśakaḥ ||54 || iti ||
S04n421:455: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptarātrajātasya bodhisattvasya mātā māyādevī kālamakarot |
S04n421:457: syāt khalu punarbhikṣavo yuṣmākamevaṃ bodhisattvāparādhena māyādevī kālagateti?
S04n421:461: atītānāmapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvānāṃ saptarātrajātānāṃ janetryaḥ kālamakurvanta |
S04n421:463: vivṛddhasya hi bodhisattvasya paripūrṇendriyasyābhiniṣkrāmato māturhṛdayaṃ sphuṭet ||
S04n421:464: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptame divase yādṛśenaiva vyūhena māyādevī kapilavastuno mahānagarādudyānabhūmimabhiniṣkrāntābhūt,
S04n421:465: tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇottareṇa mahāvyūhena bodhisattvaḥ kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ prāvikṣat |
S04n421:466: tasya ca praviśataḥ pañca pūrṇakumbhasahasrāṇi gandhodakaparipūrṇāni purato nīyante sma |
S04n421:467: evaṃ pañcakanyāsahasrāṇi mayūrahastakamparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma |
S04n421:468: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi tālavṛkṣakaparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma |
S04n421:469: pañca sa kanyāsahasrāṇi gandhodakabhṛṅgāraparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma,
S04n421:471: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi vicitrapaṭalakaparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma |
S04n421:472: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi navavicitrapralambanamālāparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma |
S04n421:473: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi ratnabhadrālaṃkāraparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma,
S04n421:475: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi bhadrāsanaparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma |
S04n421:476: pañca ca brāhmaṇasahasrāṇi ghaṇṭāparigṛhītāni māṅgalyaśabdaṃ śrāvayantaḥ purato gacchanti sma |
S04n421:477: viṃśati nāgasahasrāṇi sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāni purato gacchanti sma |
S04n421:478: viṃśati hayasahasrāṇi suvarṇālaṃkārasaṃchannāni sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāni purato gacchanti sma |
S04n421:480: cattvāriṃśatpadātisahasrāṇi śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgurūpiṇāṃ saṃnaddhadṛḍhavarmakavacānāṃ bodhisattvaṃ gacchantamanugacchanti sma |
S04n421:481: gaganatalagatāni cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānyabhijñātāni kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpāvacaradevaputrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi nānāprakrāramanekavyūhairbodhisattvasya pūjāṃ kurvanto'nugacchanti sma |
S04n421:484: viṃśati ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāni ratnasūtraparigṛhītāni taṃ rathaṃ vahanti sma |
S04n421:485: dvayoścāpsarasormadhye ekā mānuṣī kanyā dvayormānuṣīkanyayormadhye ekāpsarā |
S04n421:487: na ca mānuṣā apsarasāṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā pramādamāpadyante sma yadidaṃ bodhisattvasya tejonubhāvena ||
S04n421:488: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ kapilāhvaye puravare sarvārthasiddhāya pañcamātraiḥ śākyaśataiḥ pañcagṛhaśatāni nirmāpitānyabhūvan bodhisattvamuddiśya |
S04n421:489: te bodhisattvaṃ nagaraṃ praviśantaṃ svasvagṛhadvāramūle sthitvā kṛtāñjalipuṭā abhinatakāyāḥ sagauravā evamāhuḥ-iha bhoḥ sarvārthasiddha praviśa |
S04n421:498: tataścopādāya kumārasyeha sarvārthasiddhaḥ sarvārthasiddha iti saṃjñāmagamat ||
S04n421:499: tatra rājā śuddhodanasteṣāṃ sarveṣāmanuvartanārthaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sarvagṛheṣu praveśya caturṇāṃ māsānāmatyayādbodhisattvaṃ svagṛhe praveśayati sma |
S04n421:500: tatra ca nānāratnavyūho nāma mahāprāsādastaṃ bodhisattvaḥ samārūḍho'bhūt |
S04n421:501: tatra te bṛddhavṛddhāḥ śākyāḥ saṃnipatyaivaṃ mataṃ cārayanti sma-kā nu khalu samarthā bodhisattvaṃ gopāyituṃ kelayituṃ mamāyituṃ hitacittatayā maitracittatayā guṇacittatayā saumyacittatayā ceti |
S04n421:504: tatra mahallakamahallikāḥ śākyā evamāhuḥ-sarvā etā vadhūkā navā dahnāstaruṇyaḥ rūpayauvanamadamattāḥ |
S04n421:506: atha ca punariyaṃ mahāprajāpatī gautamī kumārasya mātṛsvasā |
S04n421:509: iti hi te sarve samagrā bhūtvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīmutsāhayanti sma |
S04n421:510: iti hi mahāprajāpatī gautamī kumāraṃ saṃvardhayati sma |
S04n421:511: tatra bodhisattvasyārthe dvātriṃśaddhātryaḥ saṃsthāpitā abhuvan aṣṭāvaṅgadhātryaḥ,
S04n421:515: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ sarvaṃ śākyagaṇaṃ saṃnipātyaivaṃ mīmāṃsate sma-kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ kumāro rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī,
S04n421:517: tena ca samayena himavataḥ parvatarājasya pārśve asito nāma maharṣiḥ prativasati sma pañcābhijñaḥ sārdhaṃ naradattena bhāgineyena |
S04n421:519: gaganatalagatāṃśca devaputrān buddhaśabdamanuśrāvayato'mbarāṇi ca bhrāmayata itastataḥ pramuditān bhramato'drākṣīt |
S04n421:521: sa divyena cakṣuṣā sarvaṃ jambudvīpamanuvilokayannadrākṣīt kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhe kumāraṃ jātaṃ śatapuṇyatejastejitaṃ sarvalokamahitaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtagātram |
S04n421:522: dṛṣṭvā ca punarnaradattaṃ māṇavakamāmantrayate sma-yat khalu māṇavaka jānīyā jambudvīpe mahāratnamutpannam |
S04n421:523: kapilavastuni mahānagare rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhe kumāro jātaḥ śatapuṇyatejastejitaḥ sarvalokamahito dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ |
S04n421:525: rājā bhaviṣyati caturaṅgaścakravartī vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājo jānapadasthāmavīryaprāptaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ |
S04n421:527: tadyathā-cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam |
S04n421:529: asya putrasahasraṃ bhaviṣyati śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām |
S04n421:533: tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddho netā ananyaneyaḥ śāstā loke saṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n421:535: atha khalvasito maharṣiḥ sārdhaṃ naradattena bhāgineyena rājahaṃsa iva gaganatalādabhyudgamya samutplutya yena kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n421:536: upasaṃkramya ṛddhiṃ pratisaṃhṛtya padbhyāmeva kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ praviśya yena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n421:538: iti hi bhikṣavo'sito maharṣiḥ paśyati sma rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhadvāre'nekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni |
S04n421:539: atha khalvasito maharṣirdauvārikamupasaṃkramyaivamāha-gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya,
S04n421:541: parameti dauvāriko'sitasya maharṣeḥ pratiśrutya yena rājā śuddhodanastenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n421:542: upasaṃkramya kṛtāñjalipuṭo rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha-yat khalu deva jānīyā ṛṣirjīrṇo vṛddho mahallako dvāre sthitaḥ |
S04n421:544: atha rājā śuddhodano'sitasya maharṣerāsanaṃ prajñāpya taṃ puruṣamevamāha-praviśatu ṛṣiriti |
S04n421:547: upasaṃkramya purataḥ sthitvā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha-jaya jaya mahārāja,
S04n421:550: atha sa rājā śuddhodano'sitasya maharṣerarghapādyamarcanaṃ ca kṛtvā sādhu suṣṭhu ca parigṛhya āsanenopanimantrayate sma |
S04n421:551: sukhopaviṣṭaṃ cainaṃ jñātvā sagauravaḥ supratīta evamāha-na smarāmyahaṃ tava ṛṣe darśanam |
S04n421:554: evamukte'sito maharṣī rājānaṃ śuddhodanametadavocat-putraste mahārāja jātastamahaṃ draṣṭukāma ihāgata iti ||
S04n421:559: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhasattvo'sitasya maharṣeranukampayā jāgaraṇanimittamakarot |
S04n421:560: atha khalu rājā śuddhodanaḥ sarvārthasiddhaṃ kumāramubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu cānuparigṛhya asitasya maharṣerantikamupanāmayati sma ||
S04n421:561: iti hi asito maharṣirbodhisattvamavalokya dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatamaśītyanuvyañjanasuvicitragātraṃ śakrabrahmalokapālātirekavapuṣaṃ dinakaraśatasahasrātirekatejasaṃ sarvāṅgasundaraṃ dṛṣṭvā codānamudānayati sma-āścaryapudgalo batāyaṃ loke prādurbhūta,
S04n421:562: mahāścaryapudgalo batāyaṃ loke prādurbhūtaḥ ityutthāyāsanātkṛtāñjalipuṭo bodhisattvasya caraṇayoḥ praṇipatya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ca bodhisattvamaṅkena parigṛhya nidhyāyannavasthito'bhūt |
S04n421:563: so'drākṣīdbodhisattvasya dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni yaiḥ samanvāgatasya puruṣapudgalasya dve gatī bhavato nānyā |
S04n421:565: sacetpunaragārādanagārikāṃ pravrajati tathāgato bhaviṣyati vighuṣṭaśabdaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n421:566: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā prārodīdaśrūṇi ca pravartayan gambhīraṃ ca niśvasati sma ||
S04n421:567: adrākṣīdrājā śuddhodano'sitaṃ maharṣiṃ rudantamaśrūṇi ca pravartayamānaṃ gambhīraṃ ca niśvasantam |
S04n421:568: dṛṣṭvā ca saṃharṣitaromakūpajātastvaritatvaritaṃ dīnamanā asitaṃ maharṣimetadavocat-kimidamṛṣe rodasi aśrūṇi ca pravartayasi gambhīraṃ ca niśvasasi?
S04n421:570: evamukte'sito maharṣī rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha-nāhaṃ mahārāja kumārasyārthena rodimi,
S04n421:574: ahaṃ ca mahārāja jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ |
S04n421:576: abhisaṃbudhya cānuttaraṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā anyena vā punaḥ kenacilloke sahadharmeṇa |
S04n421:577: sadevakasya lokasya hitāya sukhāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam |
S04n421:578: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ sattvānāṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyati |
S04n421:579: asmāttaṃ dharmaṃ śratvā jātidharmāṇaḥ sattvā jātyā parimokṣante |
S04n421:587: evameva mahārāja kadācitkarhicidbahubhiḥ kalpakoṭinayutairbuddhā bhagavanto loke utpadyante |
S04n421:591: vayaṃ ca taṃ buddharatnaṃ na drakṣyāmaḥ |
S04n421:592: ityeva tadahaṃ mahārāja rodimi paridīnamanā dīrghaṃ ca niśvasāmi yadahamimaṃ nārogye'pi rādhayiṣyāmi ||
S04n421:593: yathā hyasmākaṃ mahārāja mantravedaśāstreṣvāgacchati-nārhati sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāro'gāramadhyāvasitum |
S04n421:595: tathā hi mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāro dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samānvāgataḥ |
S04n421:598: anena mahārāja prathamena mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇena samanvāgataḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ |
S04n421:601: ūrṇā mahārāja sarvārthasiddhasya kumārasya bhruvo rmadhye jātā himarajataprakāśā |
S04n421:629: dīrghāṅguliradhaḥkramatalayormahārāja sarvārthasiddhasya kumārasya cakre jāte ci (arciṣmatī prabhāsvare site)
S04n421:632: anena mahārāja dvātriṃśattamena mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇena samanvāgataḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ |
S04n421:633: na ca mahārāja cakravartināmevaṃvidhāni lakṣaṇāni bhavanti |
S04n421:635: saṃvidyante khalu punarmahārāja sarvārthasiddhasya kumārasya kāye'śītyanuvyañjanāni,
S04n421:640: tāmranakhaśca snigdhanakhaśca vṛttāṅguliśca anupūrvacitrāṅguliśca gūḍhaśiraśca gūḍhagulphaśca ghanasaṃdhiśca aviṣamasamapādaśca āyatapārṣṇiśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ |
S04n421:641: snigdhapāṇilekhaśca tulyapāṇilekhaśca gambhīrapāṇilekhaśca ajihmapāṇilekhaśca anupūrvapāṇilekhaśca bimboṣṭhaśca noccavacanaśabdaśca mṛdutaruṇatāmrajihvaśca gajagarjitābhistanitameghasvaramadhuramañjughoṣaśca paripūrṇavyañjanaśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ |
S04n421:642: pralambabāhuśca śucigātravastusaṃpannaśca mṛdugātraśca viśālagātraśca adīnagātraśca anupūrvonnatagātraśca susamāhitagātraśca suvibhaktagātraśca pṛthuvipulasuparipūrṇajānumaṇḍalaśca vṛttagātraśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ |
S04n421:643: suparimṛṣṭagātraśca ajihmavṛṣabhagātraśca anupūrvagātraśca gambhīranābhiśca ajihmanābhiśca anupūrvanābhiśca śucyācāraśca ṛṣabhavatsamantaprāsādikaśca paramasuviśuddhavitimirālokasamantaprabhaśca nāgavilambitagatiśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ |
S04n421:644: siṃhavikrāntagatiśca ṛṣabhavikrāntagatiśca haṃsavikrāntagatiśca abhipradakṣiṇāvartagatiśca vṛttakukṣiśca mṛṣṭakukṣiśca ajihmakukṣiśca cāpodaraśca vyapagatachandadoṣanīlakālakāduṣṭaśarīraśca vṛttadaṃṣṭraśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ |
S04n421:645: tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraśca anupūrvadaṃṣṭraśca tuṅganāsaśca śucinayanaśca vimalanayanaśca prahasitanayanaśca āyatanayanaśca viśālanayanaśca nīlakuvalayadalasadṛśanayanaśca sahitabhrūśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ |
S04n421:646: citrabhrūśca asitabhrūśca saṃgatabhrūśca anupūrvabhrūśca pīnagaṇḍaśca aviṣamagaṇḍaśca vyapagatagaṇḍadoṣaśca anupahatakruṣṭaśca suviditendriyaśca suparipūrṇendriyaśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ |
S04n421:648: surabhikeśaśca aparuṣakeśaśca anākulakeśaśca anupūrvakeśaśca sukuñcitakeśaśca śrīvatsasvastikanandyāvartavardhamānasaṃsthānakeśaśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ |
S04n421:652: atha khalu rājā śuddhodano'sitasya maharṣeḥ sakāśātkumārasyedaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā saṃtuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāta utthāyāsanādbodhisattvasya caraṇayoḥ praṇipatyemāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata—
S04n421:654: vaidya sarvasya lokasya vande'hamapi tvāṃ vibho ||55 ||
S04n421:655: iti hi bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodano'sitaṃ maharṣi sārdhaṃ naradattena bhāgineyenānurūpeṇa bhaktena saṃtarpayati sma |
S04n421:657: atha khalvasito maharṣistata evarddhyā vihāyasā prākramat,
S04n421:659: atha khalu dvayaṃ saṃkramya tatra khalvasito maharṣirnaradattaṃ māṇavakametadavocat-yadā tvaṃ naradatta śṛṇuyā buddho loke utpanna iti,
S04n421:660: tadā tva gatvā tasya śāsane pravrajeḥ |
S04n421:665: buddho nāma padaṃ kimetadiha bho harṣāvahaṃ prāṇināṃ
S04n421:666: prahlāda mama kāya eti sukhitaṃ śāntaṃ ca cittaṃ param ||56 ||
S04n421:667: kiṃ devo tvasuro'thavāpi sa bhaved garuḍo'thavā kinnaraḥ
S04n421:669: divyā cakṣuṣa prekṣate daśa diśaḥ śailān mahīṃ sāgarān
S04n421:670: bhūyaḥ paśyati cādbhutaṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhūmau girau sāgare ||57 ||
S04n421:672: jātāścaiva yathā hi śailaśikhare snigdhāḥ pravālāṅkurāḥ |
S04n421:674: suvyaktaṃ tribhave bhaviṣyati laghu ratnodbhavaḥ śobhanaḥ ||58 ||
S04n421:675: bhūmirbhāti yathā ca pāṇisadṛśā sarvā samā nirmalā
S04n421:681: yatha ca snigdharavaṃ manojña śṛṇuyā divyāna saṃgītināṃ
S04n421:682: ratanasyā iva prādurbhāvu tribhave yasyā nimittā ime ||60 ||
S04n421:683: asitaḥ prekṣati jambusāhvayamidaṃ divyena vai cakṣuṣā
S04n421:688: āgatvā kapilāhvayaṃ puravaraṃ dvāri sthito bhūpateḥ |
S04n421:690: avacī sārathi rājña vedaya laghuṃ dvāre ṛṣistiṣṭhati ||62 ||
S04n421:692: dvāre deva tapasvi tiṣṭhati mahān jīrṇo ṛṣirjarjaraḥ |
S04n421:693: so cāpī abhinandate ṛṣivaraḥ prāveṣṭu rājño gṛhaṃ
S04n421:694: ājñā dīyatu tāva pārthivavarā demi praveśaṃ tesā ||63 ||
S04n421:695: sthāpyā cāsanamasya cāha nṛpatiḥ gaccha praveśaṃ dada
S04n421:696: asitaḥ sārathivākya śrutva muditaḥ prītyā sukhenānvitaḥ |
S04n421:697: śītaṃ vāri yathābhikāṅkṣi tṛṣito bhuktvādito cāśanaṃ
S04n421:699: jaya bhoḥ pārthiva ityuvāca mudito cāyuṃ ciraṃ pālaya
S04n421:700: vṛddhiṃ kṛtva niṣaṇṇa dāntamanasaḥ śāntendriyaḥ sūrataḥ |
S04n421:701: rājā vai abhivādya taṃ sunibhṛtaṃ provāca kiṃ kāraṇaṃ
S04n421:702: āgāmastava pārthivendra nilaye tad brūhi śīghraṃ mune ||65 ||
S04n421:705: taṃ draṣṭuṃ hi mamepsitaṃ narapate sarvārthasiddhaṃ śiśum
S04n421:707: sādhu svāgatu yācase kilamitaḥ prīto'smi te darśanāt
S04n421:708: eṣo'sau śayitaḥ kumāra varado draṣṭuṃ na śakyo'dhunā |
S04n421:709: sādhū tāva mūhūrtamāgama ihā yad drakṣyase nirmalaṃ
S04n421:710: candraṃ vā yatha pūrṇamāsi vimalaṃ tārāgaṇairmaṇḍitam ||67 ||
S04n421:714: asito dṛṣṭva ca tasya tau sucaraṇau cakrāṅkitau śobhanau ||68 ||
S04n421:715: pratyutthāya tataḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo caraṇāni so vandate
S04n421:718: śīrṣaṃ kampya sa vedaśāstrakuśalo dve tasya paśyadgatī ||69 ||
S04n421:719: rājā vā bhavi cakravarti balavān buddho va lokottamaḥ
S04n421:720: bāṣpaṃ tyakta sudīnakāyamanaso gambhīra niśvasya ca |
S04n421:721: udvignaśca babhūva pārthivavaraḥ kiṃ brāhmaṇo roditī
S04n421:722: mā vighnaṃ khalu paśyate'yamasitaḥ sarvārthasiddhasya me ||70 ||
S04n421:723: bhūtaṃ vyāhara kiṃ tu rodiṣi ṛṣe śreyo'tha kiṃ pāpakaṃ
S04n421:724: pāpaṃ nāsti na cāntarāyamiha bhoḥ sarvārthasiddhasya te |
S04n421:725: ātmānaṃ bahu śocamī narapate jīrṇo'smi yajjarjaraḥ
S04n421:726: yadayaṃ bheṣyati buddha lokamahito dharmaṃ yadā vakṣyate ||71 ||
S04n421:727: na drakṣe ahu labdhaprītimanaso ityartha rodāmyahaṃ
S04n421:728: yasyā kāyi bhavanti lakṣaṇavarā dvātriṃśati nirmalā |
S04n421:729: dve tasyā gatayo na anya tṛtiyā jānīṣva evaṃ nṛpa
S04n421:730: rājā vā bhavi cakravarti balavān buddho'tha lokottamaḥ ||72 ||
S04n421:731: nāyaṃ kāmaguṇebhirarthiku punaḥ buddho ayaṃ bheṣyati
S04n421:732: śrutvā vyākaraṇaṃ ṛṣeḥ sa nṛpatiḥ prītiṃ sukhaṃ labdhavān |
S04n421:735: vande tvāṃ varasārthavāha tribhave sarve jage pūjitaṃ
S04n421:736: asitaḥ prāha ca bhāgineya muditaḥ saṃśrūyatāṃ bhāṣato |
S04n421:737: buddhā bodhi yadā śṛṇoṣi jagato varteti cakraṃ hyayaṃ
S04n421:738: śīghraṃ pravraja śāsane'sya munaye tatprāpsyase nirvṛtim ||74 ||
S04n421:739: vanditvā caraṇau hyasau munivaraḥ kṛtvā ca prādakṣiṇaṃ
S04n421:740: lābhā te nṛpate sulabdha vipulā yasyedṛśaste sutaḥ |
S04n421:741: eṣo loka sadevakaṃ samanujaṃ dharmeṇa tarpeṣyati
S04n421:743: iti hi bhikṣavo jātamātrasya bodhisattvasya maheśvaro devaputraḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikān devaputrānāmantryaivamāha-yo'sau mārṣā asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrasukṛtakarmadānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñopāyaśratacaraṇavratatapaḥsucaritacaraṇaḥ mahāmaitrīmahākaruṇāmahāmuditāsamanvāgataḥ upekṣāsamudgatacittaḥ sarvasattvahitasukhodyataḥ dṛḍhavīryakavacasusaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ pūrvajinakṛtakuśalamūloditaḥ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtaḥ sukṛtaniścayaparākramaḥ paracakrapramathanaḥ suvimalaśuddhāśayasaṃpannaḥ sucaritacaraṇo mahājñānaketudhvajaḥ mārabalāntakaraṇaḥ trisāhasramahāsāhasrasārthavāhaḥ devamanuṣyapūjitamahāyajñayaṣṭaḥ susamṛddhapuṇyanicayaniḥsaraṇābhiprāyo jātijarāmaraṇāntakaraḥ sujātajātaḥ ikṣvākurājakulasaṃbhūto jagadvibodhayitā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manuṣyaloka upapannaḥ |
S04n421:745: hanta gacchāmastamabhivandituṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitumabhistotumanyeṣāṃ ca mānābhibhūtānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ mānamadadarpacchedanārtham |
S04n421:746: te'smānabhivandamānān dṛṣṭvā te'pi bodhisattvaṃ vandiṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti ca |
S04n421:747: tatteṣāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya yāvadamṛtādhigamāya |
S04n421:749: tattvavyākaraṇena ca bodhisattvaṃ vyākṛtya punarapyāgamiṣyāma iti ||
S04n421:750: atha khalu maheśvaro devaputro dvādaśabhirdevaputraśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ sarvakapilavastumahānagaramavabhāsena sphurayitvā yena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n421:751: upasaṃkramya dauvārike nivedya rājñābhyanujñāto rājakulaṃ praviśya bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandyaikāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvāṃ anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bodhisattvamaṅke samāropya rājānaṃ śuddhodanamāśvāsayati sma-tuṣṭo mahārāja bhava paramaprītaśca |
S04n421:753: yathā mahārāja bodhisattvasya lakṣaṇairanuvyañjanaiśca kāyaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ,
S04n421:754: yathā ca kumāro'bhibhavati sadevamānuṣāsuralokaṃ varṇena tejasā ca yaśasā lakṣmyā ca,
S04n421:756: iti hi bhikṣavo maheśvaro devaputraḥ sārdhaṃ śuddhāvāsakāyikairdevaputrairbodhisattvasya mahatpūjopasthānaṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvaṃ tattvavyākaraṇena vyākṛtya punarapi svabhavanaṃ prākrāmat ||
S04n421:777: tṛptiṃ na yānti ca janāḥ samudīkṣatāṃ vai ||80 ||
S04n421:779: vācā manojña yatha nāsti ha mānuṣāṇām |
S04n421:781: śaṅkā hi me suragaṇā na hi te manuṣyāḥ ||81 ||
S04n421:788: na hi mānuṣāṇa iyamīdṛśa ṛddhi kāci
S04n421:789: yatha bhāṣase ca guṇa teṣa yathā ca iryā ||83 ||
S04n421:794: dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ suravarāṃ praviśanta gehaṃ
S04n421:803: yeṣāṃ tathā bhavati yā gati yaḥ prayogaḥ |
S04n421:814: yatha lakṣaṇā yatha ca darśita lakṣitā ca
S04n421:815: yatha puṇyateji śiri mūrdha vilokitaṃ ca |
S04n421:832: hetu pratītya bhava śūnya śruṇitva dharmā
